item.title: Favorite Tools - OpenFaaS
item.author: fischbacher.markus@gmail.com (Markus Fischbacher)
item.description:
“The mission of OpenFaaS Â® is to Make Serverless Functions Simple. It can be run on any cloud through the use of portable Docker containers without the fear of getting locked-in or having to manage complex infrastructure.”

Bold statement but just so true. OpenFaaS is easily one of my favorite tools and Open-Source projects out there. There are so many things on the plus side for OpenFaaS.
